import React from 'react' import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; export default function Guide() { return (

  • Prerequisite

    To use the main functionality of the ConceptFunder:
    1. Creation of a crowdfunding company
    2. Participation in financing crowdfunding companies
    it is necessary to have MetaMask browser extension with adjusted wallet and ehtereum account. During first visit of site MetaMask suggest to connect Ethereum account:

    1.


    2.


    Connected account will be used to accomblish interaction with contract:
    - Creation crowdfunsing company
    - Participating in crowdfunding company
    - Creation request for payout
    - Approve request for payout

    How to create your first crowdfunding campaign

    To create crowdfunding company press 'Start Fundraising Project' on top panel:
    After that you should fill form and specify:
    - Title - Breif description - Goal of company - Days to achive goal - Advnced story of project Optionally you can specify links for youtube videos, upload images and files which will be accessible for viewers. Also you can add notes and files for moderation. After you have created crowdfunding company you should wait for approval by moderator. It is preferably to specify communication channel in 'Moderation notes'. If request for creation crowdfunding company approved your project will be available for viewing by other users. If company goal achieved you will have ability to request pay out by press this button on company page: You should specify: - Ether amout - Intention - Reporting - Days Then participants of you company can approve your requst. It is required that more then 50% of participants approve request. In this case requested amount of ethereum will be send to your account. When you achive your goal you can attach report for request to earn the trust of the participants of financing.

    How to help carry out the project

    • ) }
